title: Shareable Valentine Chat Single-Page App (React + TypeScript)

requirements.summary: Build the Valentine-themed single-page layout: full-viewport gradient background, centered 360px card with header, scrollable chat panel, and wrapped action buttons.
acceptanceCriteria: On load, the app displays a centered card UI matching the provided structure (header, chat panel, actions).
The page background uses a diagonal gradient visually consistent with #ff4d6d â†’ #ff758f.
The card is constrained to ~360px width on desktop and remains usable on smaller screens (e.g., scales down with padding rather than overflowing).
Chat area is visibly scrollable with a fixed-height feel comparable to the provided 350px chat panel.
Buttons are pill-shaped and share the same primary pink styling as in the provided HTML.

file_operations.description: Create the root Valentine chat page UI structure (full-page background container, centered card, header title, chat panel region, and action button region) rendered at the app root.

Add global styles to match the provided HTML/CSS layout (diagonal pink/red gradient background, centered 360px card with rounded corners + shadow, header styling, scrollable chat panel sizing, and pill button layout with wrap/gaps).

requirements.summary: Match message bubble alignment and styling for bot vs user messages (left light-pink vs right solid-pink), with consistent padding, rounded corners, and ~75% max width.
acceptanceCriteria: Bot messages visually use a light pink background distinct from the chat panel background.
User messages visually use a strong pink background with white text and are aligned to the right.
Message bubbles never exceed ~75% of the chat panel width.

file_operations.description: Render message list with sender-based classnames/structure enabling left/right alignment and distinct bubble styling for bot vs user.
Add message bubble styles to match the provided HTML/CSS (max-width ~75%, rounded corners, padding; bot: light pink background; user: solid pink background with white text and right alignment).

requirements.summary: Ensure the experience is shareable via a simple link: show the Valentine chat UI at the app root with no sign-in and no setup.
acceptanceCriteria: Navigating to the root of the deployed app shows the Valentine chat UI immediately.
No authentication prompts are shown and no user input is required to start using the chat buttons.

file_operations.description: Ensure the app root renders the Valentine chat UI immediately and does not display or trigger any authentication UI/flows (no login buttons, prompts, or required user input before using chat actions).

requirements.summary: Apply a coherent cute/romantic Valentine theme across typography, spacing, colors, and button states; avoid blue/purple palettes.
acceptanceCriteria: UI styling is consistent across header, chat panel, message bubbles, and buttons.
Hover/active/focus states for buttons fit the Valentine theme and remain readable.
No blue/purple-dominant palette is introduced.

file_operations.description: Refine global theme styling (font family similar to Segoe UI, consistent spacing, romantic pink/red palette, and readable hover/active/focus button states) while avoiding any blue/purple-dominant colors.
